capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world from birth just because of a lightning-shaped scar on your forehead? It's incredible how much pressure that must have put on him, but he always managed to rise above it.
